Package org.springframework.web.socket

Interface WebSocketMessage<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the payload type
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWebSocketMessage, BinaryMessage, PingMessage, PongMessage, TextMessage
public interface WebSocketMessage<T>
A message that can be handled or sent on a WebSocket connection.
Since:
4.0
Author:
Rossen Stoyanchev

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    getPayload()
    Return the message payload (never null).
    int
    getPayloadLength()
    Return the number of bytes contained in the message.
    boolean
    isLast()
    When partial message support is available and requested via WebSocketHandler.supportsPartialMessages(), this method returns true if the current message is the last part of the complete WebSocket message sent by the client.

  • Method Details

    • getPayload

      T getPayload()
      Return the message payload (never null).

    • getPayloadLength

      int getPayloadLength()
      Return the number of bytes contained in the message.

    • isLast

      boolean isLast()
      When partial message support is available and requested via WebSocketHandler.supportsPartialMessages(), this method returns true if the current message is the last part of the complete WebSocket message sent by the client. Otherwise false is returned if partial message support is either not available or not enabled.
